trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elenco ordinato di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TimerEventSubscriptionCollection represents the queue of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects associated with a workflow instance and provides methods to manage this queue.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un TimerEventSubscriptionCollection rappresenta la coda di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>gli oggetti associati a un flusso di lavoro dell'istanza e fornisce metodi per gestire questa coda.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are ordered in the queue based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values; those with smaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values are positioned before those with larger <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni vengono ordinate nella coda in base alle loro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valori, mentre quelli con più piccoli <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valori vengono posizionati prima di quelli con maggiore <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valori.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods provided by this class to manage the collection of active timer event subscriptions exposed by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> for each workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i metodi forniti da questa classe per gestire la raccolta delle sottoscrizioni di eventi timer attive esposta da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> to add or remove subscriptions from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A>per aggiungere o rimuovere le sottoscrizioni dalla coda del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the first element in the timer queue changes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che il primo elemento nella coda del timer cambia, il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>viene chiamato per annullare l'evento del timer che precedentemente si trovava all'inizio della coda e pianificare il nuovo evento del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> alla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>alla coda del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valori; quelli con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle con i valori superiori.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the new subscription is added at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Se la nuova sottoscrizione viene aggiunto all'inizio della coda, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per annullare l'evento del timer che precedentemente si trovava all'inizio della coda e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>per pianificare il nuovo evento del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Add locks the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> before adding the new subscription and is, therefore, thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge i blocchi di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>prima di aggiungere la nuova sottoscrizione e, pertanto è thread-safe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to add to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> da aggiungere alla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: itemè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> elements to an existing one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> elementi a un oggetto esistente unidimensionali <xref:System.Array>, a partire dall'indice di matrice specificato.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: CopyTo is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Array>deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> oggetti nella coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> oggetti nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che scorre la <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso al <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore rimane valido fino a quando la raccolta rimane invariata.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono apportate modifiche alla raccolta, ad esempio aggiungendo, modificando o eliminando elementi, l'enumeratore viene invalidato e il relativo comportamento sarà indefinito.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore non dispone di accesso esclusivo alla raccolta. Pertanto, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare l' <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>intera enumerazione tramite <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso al <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>Restituisce un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicating that access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> che indica che l'accesso al <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> all'inizio della coda del timer senza rimuoverlo.

trans-unit.source: Peek is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Peek è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the timer queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> all'inizio della coda del timer o un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic) se la coda del timer è vuota.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> that has the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> con l'id sottoscrizione specificato dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> with the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>con l'id sottoscrizione specificato dalla coda del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valori; quelli con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle con i valori superiori.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se la sottoscrizione rimossa si trovava la sottoscrizione all'inizio della coda, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per annullare l'evento del timer associata a questa sottoscrizione e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per pianificare un evento del timer per la sottoscrizione che si trova ora all'inizio della coda.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Remove is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Rimuovi sono thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Guid>del <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> da rimuovere.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>dalla coda del timer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valori; quelli con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle con i valori superiori.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se la sottoscrizione rimossa si trovava la sottoscrizione all'inizio della coda, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per annullare l'evento del timer associata a questa sottoscrizione e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per pianificare un evento del timer per la sottoscrizione che si trova ora all'inizio della coda.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>è thread-safe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> da rimuovere dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: itemè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SyncRoot returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot restituisce un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso al <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using SyncRoot or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare la <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>durante l'intera enumerazione tramite SyncRoot o intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Timer queue associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Coda del timer associata a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: This queue contains time ordered <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects for a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Questa coda contiene ora ordinato <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> oggetti per un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
